remarks: Hilbert space has the covering property (using spans of singletons to represent atoms).  Exercise 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 153.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: spansncv $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( ( A C. B /\ B C_ ( A vH ( span ` { C } ) ) ) -> B = ( A vH ( span ` { C } ) ) ) ) $.
